NFL and its players union met for two hours in Dallas to talk about a new labor deal, their first formal bargaining session in more than two months. The sides issued a joint statement, saying they plan to increase the number, length and intensity of bargaining sessions so they can reach agreement before the collective bargaining agreement expires March 4.
